DOC.brief_title: A Study Carboplatin + Paclitaxel MK0683 Patients With Chemotherapy-naive Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) ( 0683-066 )
DOC.criteria: Chemotherapynaive patient histologically cytologically diagnose NSCLC stage IIIB ( applicable radical thoracic radiation ) stage IV Patients normal organ function bone marrow function Given radical thoracic radiation NSCLC radiation original lesion within 3 week Any peripheral neuropathy grade 2 Any ascites , pleural effusion pericardiac effusion require treatment Any uncontrolled concomitant illness Pregnant breastfeeding
